backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and per-user quiz sets with access control, including CRUD-like queries for quizzes and questions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three UI/translation-related frontend requirements tied to QuizGameplay.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend files, features, and behaviors including quiz editing, gameplay, and translation UI.
frontend/.env.example: Environment template defining configurable translation API endpoint for frontend translation requests.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind theme defining OKLCH color variables and utilities for a warm educational light/dark mode palette.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA controller handling authentication, profile setup, and switching between quiz editor, gameplay, and results views.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal form for first-time users to submit and save their display name.
frontend/src/config/translation.ts: Client-side translation utility wrapping a configurable translation API with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functionality, and initializes AuthClient with stored or new identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps common backend queries and mutations for profiles, quizzes, and questions using React Query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionTranslatio: Handles translation requests for question text with caching, error tracking, and translation state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizRecovery.ts: Allows restoring questions from one quiz to another and invalidates affected queries while tracking recovery state and errors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/quiz/adaptiveScheduler.ts: Implements an adaptive question scheduler with randomized order, repeat logic, and performance tracking.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/PdfImportPre: Empty placeholder file for PDF import preview UI.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfImportTyp: Empty file intended to hold PDF import-related TypeScript types.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfTextExtra: Empty file intended for PDF text extraction logic.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/questionExtr: Empty file intended to parse extracted PDF text into quiz questions.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizEditor.tsx: Provides a UI for editing quizzes, managing questions, saving changes, and optionally restoring content from other quizzes.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx: Runs the quiz gameplay loop with adaptive scheduling, answer handling, progress tracking, and optional question translation.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizResults.tsx: Displays quiz results with score breakdown, encouragement message, and buttons to replay or edit questions.
frontend/src/quiz/sessionTypes.ts: Defines interfaces for tracking question performance and overall quiz session state.
frontend/src/quiz/TroubleshootingPanel.t: Shows a collapsible panel listing quizzes and their question counts, highlighting issues like empty current quizzes.
frontend/src/quiz/types.ts: Re-exports Question and QuizId types from the backend.
frontend/src/quiz/validation.ts: Validates quiz questions, ensuring required text, valid answer counts, and a correct answer selection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s versioned state and lists existing features of an ICP Motoko + React app scaffold, including auth, quiz flows, PDF import, and UI/build templates.
